net.cinnom.nanocuckoo.encode

Class UnsafeEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cinnom.nanocuckoo.encode.UnsafeEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StringEncoder

    public class UnsafeEncoder
extends java.lang.Object
implements StringEncoder
    StringEncoder that will directly copy char[] to byte[] using Unsafe. Note that endianness of the resulting byte[] will be system-dependent; this encoder should not be used across platforms that store characters in different formats.

    Performance on this encoder is better than all other encoders for Strings around 40 characters or more.

      Instantiate an UnsafeEncoder.
